transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ji, theek.
Executive: Anisha baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: Actually na sir, main aapko catalog abhi is waqt check kar rahi thi, toh aapne fir se maine mana kiya tha aapko ki part truck load wali jo lead hai, usko aap wrong mat mark kariye. Theek hai? Woh already aapke paas mein pehle added tha, but humne usko beech mein band kar diya tha. Ab agar koi bhi aisi lead aa rahi hai toh aap usko avoid kar dijiye. Simple si cheez hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Toh aapne, aapne full truck wali ki bhi do-teen lead ko mark kiya hua hai not relevant aur part truck wali ko bhi not relevant mark kiya hua hai. Toh sir is tarah se toh fir hamara consumption hi low ho jayega na?
Customer: Dekhna padega madam.
Executive: Aapne, aapne yaad nahi hai. Aapne mark kiya hai maine.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapne by lead consume kari hai na? Toh usme hua kya hai ki aapne, main bata deti hu aapko kaun-kaun si leads aapne mark kari hui thi. Toh usme hota kya hai agar aap, aapne products koi update kiya hua hai already toh aap usko agar mark kar doge by lead not relevant toh fir aapke paas mein aayegi kaun si by lead, yeh bataiye.
Customer: Haan ji, pehli baat toh dekho main aapko batana chahunga. Mere ko jaisi by leads chahiye, waise mil hi nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Jaisi chahiye matlab?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Mere ko full truck load chahiye Raipur, Bhilai, Durg se aur Rajnandgaon se. Ab us jagah mein koi by lead aati hi nahi hai. Maine subscription leke aise matlab woh type ka ho gaya hu. Waha ka koi by lead aata hi nahi hai mere paas. Ek-do aa gaya toh woh bhi rate down nahi usse.
Executive: Toh sir, aap deal Chhattisgarh mein karte hain na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Pura Chhattisgarh deal karte hain. Ab Bilaspur ki abhi ek lead thi apne paas mein, Gorila to Bilaspur part truck loaded transportation.
Customer: Woh dekho, usme part truck load mein nahi karta na madam.
Executive: Mujhe pata hai sir aap nahi karte hain, lekin pehle aapne yeh product toh mark kara hua tha na apne paas mein. Aapne product toh dikhaya tha toh system ko kya pata hai ki woh already aap usme deal karte ho. Toh system us hisab se aapko lead bhej raha hai. Fir last time jab humne discussion kiya tha toh aapne bola ki part time, part truck mein hum nahi deal kar rahe hain. Toh fir maine usko lock kar diya tha already. But abhi jab humne lock kar diya hai aur fir bhi agar uski lead aapko dekhne ko mil rahi hai toh that's mean not ki aapke paas mein woh consume karne ke liye hi aayi hui hai. Aap usko chhod ke koi aur lead consume kar lo. Avoid kar lo usko.
Customer: Hello, theek hai madam, main abhi thoda busy hu. Main phone, main abhi busy hu, thoda baad mein lagata hu.
Executive: Sir sirf do minute dijiyega. Abhi kya hai ki aapke paas mein jaise main dekh pa rahi hu ki full truck loaded ki aapke paas mein lead aayi. Theek hai? Ab aap bhi.
Customer: Haan, woh main side open kar leta hu.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kaha pe hai madam full truck load?
Executive: Upar aap lagaiye filter.
Customer: Filter kaun sa full truck loads maine service laga diya.
Executive: Category, category product ka filter hai. Waha pe chaar, teen-chaar aapke paas mein option aa rahe hain. Full truck loaded transportation service, good transportation service hai. Usme full truck pe click kariye ek bari.
Customer: Full truck maine kar liya.
Executive: Theek hai. Ab aap dekh rahe hoge ek aapke paas mein lead aa rahi hai full truck loaded transportation services Chhattisgarh Raipur.
Customer: Ek minute, ek minute madam call aa raha hai na.
Executive: Haan hold kar dijiye aap.
Customer: Haan yeh kya bata rahe madam?
Executive: Maine bola ki aapne full truck loaded. Haan.
Customer: Ek minute. Raipur Chhattisgarh aa rahi hai. Ab usme side mein dekhiye ek jagah pe view similar aa raha hai, short listed aa raha hai, hide aur not relevant aa raha hai. Toh usko short listed kar do.
Customer: Bargarh Odisha mein hai madam ji.
Executive: Nahi nahi Raipur Chhattisgarh ki hai. Raipur ke
Customer: Wahi toh aata hai.
Customer: Madam Raipur Chhattisgarh nahi hai woh madam woh Raipur likh diya usne. Magar woh jo aap Bargarh search karoge na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Woh Odisha ki hai.
Executive: Yeh kaise pata aapko?
Customer: Madam abhi maine Google pe search mara hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega. Main na aapko ek screenshot bhej rahi hu. Zara WhatsApp check kariye. Yahi cheez aap dekh rahe ho ya koi aur dekh rahe ho?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Dekhiye maine bheja aapko.
Customer: Madam ek minute, main na thoda washroom mein hu madam. Main aapko phone karta hu baad mein.
Executive: Uh sir, do minute.
Executive: Theek hai aap dekh lijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting byleads as desired.

- Customer marking relevant leads as not relevant.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to filter full truck leads.

- Executive sent a screenshot on WhatsApp for verification.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the screenshot and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, filters, transportation
